price: 64. Dan dikatakan (kepada mereka), “Serulah sekutu-sekutumu,” lalu mereka menyerunya, tetapi yang diseru tidak menyambutnya, dan mereka melihat azab. (Mereka itu berkeinginan) sekiranya mereka dahulu menerima petunjuk.
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla id'ʿū shurakāakum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wara-awū al-ʿadhāba law annahum kānū yahtadūna
